docs.title: The 2023 PIG-PARADIGM meeting at UC Davis, April 18 and 19
docs.text: The April 2023 PIG-PARADIGM meeting will take place at UC Davis on April 18 and 19. This is an in-person event with limited hybrid offerings.

docs.title: April 18-19, 2023
docs.text:
UC Davis campus -

  • April 18 - UC Davis conference center + breakout rooms
  • April 19 - Putah Creek Lodge + breakout rooms

Registration and hotel booking deadlines: March 17th, 2023.

docs.title: Registration
docs.text:
Please fill out this form to register your intent to attend.

The safety of attendees is a top priority. Attendees are strongly encouraged to follow these COVID-19 precautions.

docs.title: Booking hotel rooms
docs.text:
If you need accomodation, please fill out this form by midnight on March 17th. We plan to book all hotel rooms centrally.

Please contact Lasse Sommer Mikkelsen via e-mail at lsm@anivet.au.dk if you have questions about accomodations.

docs.title: Contact
docs.text: For questions or concerns contact Titus Brown at ctbrown@ucdavis.edu.

docs.title: COVID-19
docs.text: The safety of attendees is our top priority. We will continue to closely monitor local and institutional policies regarding Covid-19 safety. We ask that all attendees conduct themselves in a manner that respects others and preserves public health. At present, we expect that the following will apply to our meeting:

docs.title: Testing
docs.text: Attendees are strongly encouraged to self-administer a lateral flow test each day before entering the conference. Please allow time to self-test before entering the meeting. Please do not attend the meeting in the event of a positive COVID test in the days leading up to the meeting. Visit the Montgomery County COVID information portal for information on local testing facilities.

docs.title: Vaccines
docs.text: Attendees are strongly encouraged to be current on COVID-19 vaccinations. The latest guidelines from the Centers for Disease Control are available here.

docs.title: Masks
docs.text: Masks are optional but will be provided by the organizers.

docs.title: Symptoms
docs.text:
If you present any of the following COVID-19 symptoms, please isolate.

  • Fever or chills
  • Cough
  • Shortness of breath or difficulty breathing
  • Fatigue
  • Muscle or body aches
  • Headache
  • Nausea or vomiting
  • Diarrhea
  • New loss of taste or smell
  • Sore throat
  • Congestion or runny nose
